column5: Well, I just saw (online) a picture and article about a guy that caught a 22.7 lb lg. mouth out of a lake in Japan... has this thing been proven to be legit ?

yes, its been in the news for quite some time now. the IGFA has classified it as a world record... well, technically its now tied for the world record largie, because anything under 25lbs must be beat by 2oz or more. but to anyone else, he owns the record.
Sure has.... It's tied for first place...recently recognized by the IGFA.  There was a post on this very topic a week or so ago.  RFS
here's a video of this beast    and a vid of a 25lber no idea if this is real or not but it looks legit.
any idea if it was released ? or what he was tossing ?
You can read more on it here....  Itâ€™s official! largemouth bass caught in Japan ties IGFA All-Tackle World Record
I bet the Japanese are cursing that invasive species, dang largemouth eating everything in sight!
